title: install: all.bash fails with confusing error message on Windows
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
$ cd $GOROOT/src
$ pwd
/C/MinGW/go/src
$ export GOROOT=c:/NO_SUCH_THING # set GOROOT to non-existant directory
$ ./all.bash
./env.bash: line 9: cd: c:/NO_SUCH_THING: No such file or directory
$GOROOT is not set correctly or not exported: /C/MinGW/go/src
$

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.
$ hg id
e254bd08d0aa+ tip
